text: Arthur Hardy (15 April 1870 – 1951) was a London born British actor, whose appearances include Atlantic (1929) and Dreyfus (1931). ==Filmography== *Atlantic (1929) - Maj Boldy *Raise the Roof (1930) - Croxley Bellairs *Dreyfus (1931) - Gen. Mercier *Creeping Shadows (1931) - Sir Edwin Paget *The Great Gay Road (1931) - Sir Crispin *Creeping Shadows (1931) *Other People's Sins (1931) *Abdul the Damned (1935) - Ambassador *The Amazing Quest of Ernest Bliss (1936) - Crawley *The Vulture (1937) - Li Fu ==References== ==External links== * *BFI Category:British male film actors Category:1870 births Category:1951 deaths Category:20th-century British male actors Category:British male stage actors
title: Arthur Hardy (actor)
